datasets.name: data.csv
datasets.description: Related to digital painting, graphics design, and visual effects.

columns.name: technology_platforms_used
columns.description: Number of different technology platforms the artist uses for digital art creation

columns.name: art_style_popularity_percentile
columns.description: Percentile ranking of the artist's primary art style among digital art styles

columns.name: frequency_of_technology_training
columns.description: How often the artist attends training sessions on new digital art technologies per year

columns.name: software_complexity_level
columns.description: The complexity level of software tools used by the artist, scaled from 1 to 10.

columns.name: art_competitions_participated
columns.description: Number of digital art competitions the artist has participated in

columns.name: active_in_online_communities
columns.description: Whether the artist is active in online art communities

columns.name: formal_digital_art_education
columns.description: Indicates the level of formal education the artist has received in digital art techniques

columns.name: digital_tool_diversity
columns.description: Number of different digital tools used by the artist

columns.name: tutorials_offered
columns.description: Number of digital art tutorials offered by the artist

columns.name: art_forum_participations
columns.description: Number of art forums the artist is active in

columns.name: mentor_consultation_frequency
columns.description: Average number of times per month the artist consults with a mentor experienced in digital art

columns.name: portfolio_updated_frequency
columns.description: How frequently the artist updates their digital portfolio, measured in updates per year

columns.name: featured_in_magazines
columns.description: Number of times the artist's work has been featured in digital art magazines

columns.name: award_recipient
columns.description: Whether the artist has received any digital art-related awards (true or false)

columns.name: artist_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each artist

columns.name: software_proficiency_level
columns.description: Rating of the artist's proficiency with digital art software tools, from beginner to expert

columns.name: software_type
columns.description: Type of software used by the artist, either AI-based or traditional

columns.name: international_contests_participated
columns.description: Number of international digital art contests the artist has participated in.

columns.name: uses_advanced_digital_tools
columns.description: Whether the artist frequently uses advanced digital tools for creating artworks

columns.name: high_end_equipment_ownership
columns.description: Whether the artist owns high-end digital art equipment, necessary for advanced digital art creation.

columns.name: estimated_followers
columns.description: Estimated number of followers for the artist

columns.name: total_art_competitions
columns.description: Total number of digital art competitions the artist has participated in

columns.name: artworks_created
columns.description: Number of artworks created by the artist

columns.name: focus_on_3D_modeling
columns.description: Indicates if the artist primarily focuses on 3D modeling in their digital artwork.

columns.name: regular_competition_participant
columns.description: Whether the artist regularly participates in digital art competitions

columns.name: regional_exposure
columns.description: Number of different regions where the artist has held exhibitions or workshops

columns.name: active_in_tech_art_forums
columns.description: Indicates whether the artist frequently participates in online forums and communities focused on technology in art.

columns.name: formal_education_in_digital_art
columns.description: Whether the artist has received formal education specifically in digital art

columns.name: participation_in_competitions
columns.description: Whether the artist participates in digital art competitions

columns.name: online_engagement_rate
columns.description: Percentage of online interactions per posted artwork

columns.name: focus_on_digital_painting
columns.description: Whether the artist primarily focuses on digital painting

columns.name: percentage_digital_tools_used
columns.description: Percentage of digital tools used in the creation of artworks

columns.name: offers_digital_art_tutorials
columns.description: Indicates whether the artist offers tutorials on digital art

columns.name: software_training_courses
columns.description: Number of specialized software training courses the artist has completed, related to digital artistry.

columns.name: online_community_engagement
columns.description: Level of engagement the artist has with online digital art communities, rated from low to high

columns.name: specialized_in_digital_painting
columns.description: Whether the artist is specialized in digital painting or not.

columns.name: genre_specialization
columns.description: Number of digital art genres the artist specializes in

columns.name: featured_in_top_percentile
columns.description: Whether the artists' artwork was featured in top percentile rankings

columns.name: collaborations_per_year
columns.description: Average number of collaborations per year the artist is involved in

columns.name: recent_tech_training_years
columns.description: The number of years since the artist last participated in a technological upgrade training session

columns.name: artistic_tools_diversity
columns.description: Number of different artistic tools (software, hardware) used by the artist

columns.name: award_wins
columns.description: Number of awards the artist has won in competitions

columns.name: collaboration_frequency
columns.description: Number of times the artist collaborates with others per year

columns.name: genres_covered
columns.description: Number of different genres the artist's work spans

columns.name: technical_training_level
columns.description: Represents the level of formal training the artist has received in digital art software, rated from no training (0) to expert training (10).

columns.name: collaboration_projects
columns.description: Number of collaboration projects the artist has worked on

columns.name: year_over_year_submission_increase
columns.description: Percentage increase in digital art submissions year over year

columns.name: years_active
columns.description: Number of years the artist has been active in digital art

columns.name: online_art_community_engagement
columns.description: Level of activity and participation an artist has in online art communities

columns.name: digital_art_revenue_percentage
columns.description: Percentage of total revenue that comes from digital art sales

columns.name: online_art_engagement
columns.description: Artist's engagement level on online art platforms, scaled from 0 (no engagement) to 1 (high engagement)

columns.name: based_in_tech_hub
columns.description: Indicates if the artist is based in a region known for technological innovation

columns.name: years_of_experience
columns.description: Number of years the artist has been actively creating digital art

columns.name: digital_to_traditional_ratio
columns.description: Ratio of digital artworks to traditional artworks created by the artist

queries.question: What is the relationship between the cube root of the digital-to-traditional artwork ratio and the number of collaboration projects, considering the influence of art forum participations?
queries.true_hypothesis: Artists with the cube root of the ratio of digital to traditional artworks plus twice the number of art forums participations have a higher number of collaboration projects, due to the combined influence of digital-traditional blend and active art forum involvement.
